indicator_definition: Mobilized amount of United States dollars per year starting in 2020 accountable towards the $100 billion commitment.

en.goal_meta_national_link_text: Metadata on the presented time series
en.indicator_name: International financial flows to developing countries in support of clean energy research and development and renewable energy production, including in hybrid systems
en.target_name: By 2030, enhance international cooperation to facilitate access to clean energy research and technology, including renewable energy, energy efficiency and advanced and cleaner fossil-fuel technology, and promote investment in energy infrastructure and clean energy technology
en.un_designated_tier: Tier I
en.un_custodian_agency:
Organisation for Economic Co-operation and Development (OECD)
International Renewable Energy Agency (IRENA)
en.page_content:
Not applicable
This indicator is marked as not applicable for the provision of national time series. Possible reasons are: - The indicator is a global indicator that is to say the provision of national data for this indicator would not be meaningful. - The indicator or the corresponding target refers to a specific group of countries (for example small island developing states), to which Germany does not belong.
